music

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • music.AudioPlayer

  • public class AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents audio in the program. It plays/pause the soundtracks, and plays soundeffects.
    Author:
    Arindam Kulkarni and Dhruv Lohani

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream audioStream
      audioStream represents the player which plays the music in the java program.
      javax.sound.sampled.Clip clip
      Clip represents a clip in the java program that plays music.
      java.io.File file
      file represents the file from which the audio is being played from.
      boolean hasMusicStarted
      hasMusicStarted represents whether the music has started playing or not.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AudioPlayer(java.io.File file)
      Creates an object of the AudioPlayer class.
      AudioPlayer(java.lang.String s)
      Creates an object of the AudioPlayer class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pause()
      Pauses the music.
      void play()
      Plays the music, and loops it continuously.
      void reset()
      Resets the music back to position 0.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioPlayer

        public AudioPlayer(java.io.File file)
        Creates an object of the AudioPlayer class.
        Parameters:
        file - represents the file from which the music is stored in, and to be played from.

      • AudioPlayer

        public AudioPlayer(java.lang.String s)
        Creates an object of the AudioPlayer class.
        Parameters:
        s - the string which is the path of the file from which the music is going to be played from.

    • Method Detail

        Plays the music, and loops it continuously.
